notes.title: Funding
notes.p: This work was supported by the National Natural Science Foundation of China (Grant Nos. 81770594 and 81670537) Shaanxi Key Research and Development Program (S2018-YF-ZDSF-0240), and the National Science and Technology Projects on Major Infectious Diseases (13th Five Year, China) (Project No. 2017ZX10202202-002-006). The programs of funders had no role in the design and conduct of study; collection, management, analysis and interpretation of the data; preparation, review, or approval of the manuscript; and decision to submit the manuscript for publication.
